%{number} Ліцензійний ключ не зареєстров: %{number} Ліцензійний ключ не зареєстровано в Connect | %{number} Ліцензійні ключі не зареєстровані в Connect
Are you sure you wish to close this page: Ви впевнені, що хочете закрити цю сторінку? Весь незбережений прогрес буде втрачено.
Використовуйте цю сторінку для завантаже: Використовуйте цю сторінку для завантаження ліцензійних ключів для ваших активних та неактивних серверів. Їх можна використовувати для перенесення Unraid на новий флеш-накопичувач та перегляду всіх копій Unraid, зареєстрованих на вашу електронну пошту.
Signed In Keys (Servers are currently si: Авторизовані ключі (Сервери наразі підключені до Connect)
Signed Out Keys (Possibly available for: Вийдені ключі (Можливо доступні для використання на інших Серверах).
Встановіть Образ заголовка у веб-інтерфе: Встановіть Образ заголовка у веб-інтерфейсі сервера у розділі [Налаштування → Налаштування відображення → Показувати банер (встановіть значення Так) → Власний банер (завантажте зображення)].
To use a custom image for your server, t: Щоб використовувати власний образ для вашого сервера, сервер має бути доступним через домен myunraid.net.
Натисніть посилання нижче, щоб спробуват: Натисніть посилання нижче, щоб спробувати перейти на сторінку налаштувань дисплея, використовуючи останню доступну URL-адресу сервера
Header images are cached once loaded and: Образ заголовків кешуються після завантаження та не оновлюватимуться, доки ви не натиснете кнопку нижче.
Could not fetch a header image for this: Could not fetch a header image for this server, are you sure it has one set and is online
This Page Could Not Be Found: This Page Could Not Be Found
Adding a Server to Unraid Connect: Adding a Server to Unraid Connect
Sign In With Your Unraid.net Credentials: Sign In With Your Unraid.net Credentials
Click the top right corner of your Unrai: Click the top right corner of your Unraid server, and click Sign In. Follow the prompts to sign in with your Unraid.net credentials, or create a new account.
Register Your Server with Unraid Connect: Register Your Server with Unraid Connect by following the prompts
Come Back to This Page and Click Continu: Come Back to This Page and Click Continue
Click the button to download a flash bac: Click the button to download a flash backup for this server. You can restore this backup by copying the files onto your boot drive. Once generated the download link will expire in 60 seconds.
Your download zip should have automatica: Your download zip should have automatically downloaded. But you can download again if needed.
Once expired just click the button again: Once expired just click the button again to get a new download link.
These URLs are currently accessible from: These URLs are currently accessible from your location. This means they are using a myunraid.net cerificate, and are running the latest Unraid Connect plugin.
These URLs are currently inaccessible fr: These URLs are currently inaccessible from your location. This means they may be offline, not using a myunraid.net certificate, or are inaccessible from your current location. These URLs may still allow access to the server.
No URLs available for this server. Pleas: No URLs available for this server. Please make sure the Connect plugin is running and the server is fully signed in.
Unraid will disallow remote access as so: Unraid will disallow remote access as soon as this action completes.
When using UPNP Remote Access, it may ta: When using UPNP Remote Access, it may take a few minutes for your router to remove the lease.
Dynamic Remote Access is enabled, but no: Dynamic Remote Access is enabled, but not required for this server to be managed from your current location.
Update your plugin in the Unraid WebGUI: Update your plugin in the Unraid WebGUI Plugins Tab to view more data
Unraid Connect is the next evolution of: Unraid Connect is the next evolution of My Servers. If you were previously using the My Servers plugin, please navigate to the Plugins tab on your server and update to the latest version.
Toggle on/off server accessibility with: Toggle on/off server accessibility with dynamic remote access. Automatically turn on UPnP and open a random WAN port on your router at the click of a button and close off access in seconds.
Servers equipped with a myunraid.net cer: Servers equipped with a myunraid.net certificate can be managed directly from within the Connect web UI. Manage multiple servers from your phone, tablet, laptop, or PC in the same browser window.
The Connect dashboard links to relevant: The Connect dashboard links to relevant sections of the webgui, allowing quick access to those settings and server sections.
Never ever be left without a backup of y: Never ever be left without a backup of your config. If you need to change flash drives, generate a backup from Connect and be up and running in minutes.
Connect offers a comprehensive overview: Connect offers a comprehensive overview of your Unraid server's online/offline status, available storage, license type, uptime, OS version, and more at a glance.
Set custom server tiles how you like and: Set custom server tiles how you like and automatically display your server's banner image on your Connect Dashboard. You can even enjoy Connect dark or light mode.
Manage your license keys at any time or: Manage your license keys at any time or even upgrade your license via the My Keys section.
With a global user base, Connect is avai: With a global user base, Connect is available in English, German, French, Spanish or Chinese.
How do I learn more about Unraid Connect: How do I learn more about Unraid Connect?

Use this page to manage flash backup for: Use this page to manage flash backup for your servers. This allows you to download a backup of your server configuration and data.
